title: Overall System Performance
description: ggregate results - total IOPS over all machines / average CPU util over all machines / average MEM util over all machines

targets.alias: Total amount of IOPS READ (all virtual disks)
targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "disk.iops.read|m" WHERE "type" = 'virtual' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

targets.alias: Total amount of IOPS WRITTEN (all virtual disks)
targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "disk.iops.read|m" WHERE "type" = 'virtual' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "machine.CPU.utilisation|m" WHERE "type" = 'physical' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT min("value") *100 FROM "machine.CPU.utilisation|m" WHERE "type" = 'physical' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("value")  *100 FROM "machine.CPU.utilisation|m" WHERE "type" = 'physical' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "machine.CPU.utilisation|m" WHERE "type" = 'physical' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT min("value") *100 FROM "machine.CPU.utilisation|m" WHERE "type" = 'physical' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("value")  *100 FROM "machine.CPU.utilisation|m" WHERE "type" = 'physical' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")  / 1024 FROM "machine.memory.ram.available|m" WHERE "type" = 'physical' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "machine.memory.ram.available|m" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "machine.memory.ram.available|m" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: GiB RAM available (for all physical nodes)

targets.query: SELECT mean("value")  /128 FROM "network.throughput.incoming|m" WHERE "type" = 'physical' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "machine.memory.ram.available|m" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "machine.memory.ram.available|m" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Rx in Gbit/s (for all physical NICs)
Distribution of Rx on physcal NICs (in Gbits/s)

targets.query: SELECT mean("value")  / 1024 FROM "machine.memory.ram.available|m" WHERE "type" = 'physical' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "machine.memory.ram.available|m" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "machine.memory.ram.available|m" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Tx in Gbit/s (for all physical NICs)
Distribution of Tx on phiscal NICs (in Gbits/s)

targets.query: SELECT mean("value")  / 1024 FROM "machine.memory.ram.available|m" WHERE "type" = 'physical' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "machine.memory.ram.available|m" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "machine.memory.ram.available|m" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
